channel.title: 718 - Chronicscape Project release
channel.description:
Hey! I'm new to coding and downloaded the above cache, Client, and Server to get me started. At first I logged in the screen was black but I could see the minimap. So I cleared the data/map/archivekeys/packed.mcx + /unpacked files. and when I try log in I get this error message:
"Java.Lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java Heap Space"
Please help I really wanna start coding soon!

item.title: 718 - Chronicscape Project release
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

You will need to increase the heap-size, post your run batch script.

Read full topic
